nodes.title: Rag After-Party
nodes.story: Rag week. You're painted blue and gold, drunk on cheap cider. Your crush from chemistry practicals is here, equally wasted. 'I've wanted to kiss you since first year!' you slur. They laugh. 'Prove it!' The res common room empties. It's just you two and a half-empty bottle of Viceroy.

choices.text: Take a shot for courage first
Vomit in a plant and excuse yourself

nodes.title: Morning After Awkwardness
nodes.story: You wake up in their single res bed. Naked. They're already up, making coffee. 'So... that happened.' You notice a framed photo: them with a partner. 'My boyfriend is in Germany on exchange,' they say casually. 'Open relationship though.' Your phone: 15 missed calls from your roommate.

choices.text: Ask if you can see them again
Ask for a threesome when boyfriend returns

nodes.title: Complicated Situationship
nodes.story: You become their 'campus partner.' Weekday hookups, weekends they FaceTime their boyfriend. You catch feelings. They say, 'Don't fall in love, it's just fun.' During midterms, they ghost you for a week. You see them holding hands with someone new at The Radium.

choices.text: Start hooking up with their friend

nodes.title: Campus Drama Queen
nodes.story: You make a scene at the cafeteria. 'You used me!' Security escorts you out. The video goes viral: '#WitsDrama.' You're temporarily suspended for disrupting campus peace. Your crush transfers to UJ. You become a meme: 'Rag Week Regret.'

choices.endingText: You drop out, become a micro-influencer. Your TikTok about campus drama gets brand deals. Your crush becomes a lawyer. You meet at a club years later - they don't recognize you.
